sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE ESACDDT( SYS_ID VARCHAR(18), GRP_CD VARCHAR(18), DTL_CD VARCHAR(18), SORT_ORD NUMBER, USE_YN CHAR(1), FLAG CHAR(1), VAL NUMBER, REM VARCHAR(300), STS CHAR(1), REG_ID VARCHAR(18), REG_DT TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE(17), MOD_ID VARCHAR(18), MOD_DT TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE(17), CONSTRAINT ESACDDT_PK PRIMARY KEY ( SYS_ID, GRP_CD, DTL_CD ) )

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03, C04, C05) AS ( SELECT 1, 'ESACDDT' , 'SYS_ID', 'VARCHAR', 18 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'ESACDDT' , 'GRP_CD', 'VARCHAR', 18 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'ESACDDT' , 'DTL_CD', 'VARCHAR', 18 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'ESACDDT' , 'SORT_ORD', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'ESACDDT' , 'USE_YN', 'CHAR', 1 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'ESACDDT' , 'FLAG', 'CHAR', 1 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'ESACDDT' , 'VAL', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'ESACDDT' , 'REM', 'VARCHAR', 300 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'ESACDDT' , 'STS', 'CHAR', 1 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'ESACDDT' , 'REG_ID', 'VARCHAR', 18 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11, 'ESACDDT' , 'REG_DT', 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE', 17 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12, 'ESACDDT' , 'MOD_ID', 'VARCHAR', 18 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 13, 'ESACDDT' , 'MOD_DT', 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE', 17 FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COLUMN_NAME IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.C02 AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C03 ORDER BY A.C01

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03) AS ( SELECT 1, 'SYS_ID', '시스템 아이디 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'GRP_CD', '그룹 코드 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'DTL_CD', '상세 코드 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'SORT_ORD', '정렬 순서 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'USE_YN', '사용 여부 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'FLAG', '플래그 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'VAL', '값 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'REM', '비고 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'STS', '상태 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'REG_ID', '등록자 아이디 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11, 'REG_DT', '등록 일시 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12, 'MOD_ID', '수정자 아이디 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 13, 'MOD_DT', '수정 일시 ' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,B.TABLE_NAME ,B.COMMENTS ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = #table_name# AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C02
sql-descriptor.sq: WITH T01 ( SYS_ID ,GRP_CD ,DTL_CD ,SORT_ORD ,USE_YN ,FLAG ,VAL ,REM ,STS ,REG_ID ,REG_DT ,MOD_ID ,MOD_DT ) AS ( SELECT '100', 'CHK_USER', 'AUTH', 2, 'Y', ' ', 0, 'GE001037,GE00059', 'U', 'SYSTEMPG', '2024-07-28 15:44:00', 'SYSTEMPG', '2024-07-28 15:44:00' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '100', 'CHK_USER', 'DEGR', 4, 'Y', ' ', 0, 'GE001037,TSA00024', 'C', 'GE001037', '2022-07-14 15:03:03.0 Asia/Seoul', NULL, '2022-07-14 15:03:03.0 Asia/Seoul' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '100', 'CONF' , '0002', 2, 'Y', 'N', 0, '20240901' , 'U', 'SYSTEMPG', '2024-07-28 22:20:00', 'SYSTEMPG', '2024-07-28 22:20:00' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.SYS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ESACDDT B ON B.SYS_ID = A.SYS_ID AND B.GRP_CD = A.GRP_CD AND B.DTL_CD = A.DTL_CD
